task_description:
You will read a brief excerpt of a conversation between a person describing a personal experience and the response of a chatbot or human. Please rate each response on a scale of 1 to 5, according to its:
  1. empathy/sympathy: did the responses show understanding of the feelings of the person talking about their experience? (1: not at all, 3: somewhat, 5: very much)
  2. relevance: did the responses seem appropriate to the conversation? were they on-topic? (1: not at all, 3: somewhat, 5: very much)
  3. fluency: could you understand the responses? did the language seem accurate? (1: not at all, 3: somewhat, 5: very much)
You will repeat this for several conversations. You will be limited to completing at most 10 of these HITs. Thanks!
chat_title: Rate chatbot responses after reading short conversation about a personal experience
